---
name: Maintenance Report
about: Report a maintenance or housekeeping task
title: "Maintenance: [Short description of task]"
labels: maintenance, needs-triage
assignees:

---

## Maintenance Guidelines

### Task Description
A clear and concise description of the maintenance task.

### Impact
Explain the impact of this maintenance task - what parts of the project does it affect?

### Proposed Changes
A clear and concise description of the changes you plan to make for this maintenance task.

### Additional Context
Add any other context or screenshots about the maintenance task here.
